item.title: 经济疲软，新西兰失业率创九年新高
item.description: 由于经济疲软导致企业不愿招收新员工，新西兰第三季度的失业率升至九年来的最高点。【原文：New Zealand’s jobless rate rose to the highest in nine years in the third quarter as the weak economy made firms reluctant to take on new workers.】

item.title: 科技股涨势蹒跚，零售交易员遭遇四月以来最糟糕一天
item.description: 对于扎堆买入最热门股票的日间交易者来说，周二是自唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战在四月引发混乱以来最糟糕的一天。【原文：For the day traders who pile into the hottest stocks, Tuesday was the worst day since the April chaos caused by Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 澳大利亚扩大对 16 岁以下青少年的社交媒体禁令，将 Reddit 纳入其中
item.description: 澳大利亚扩大了对 16 岁以下青少年的社交媒体禁令，将包括 Reddit 在内的一些二级平台也纳入其中。【原文：Australia broadened its social media ban for under-16s to include some second-tier platforms including Reddit, a little more than a month before the world-first legislation takes effect.】

item.title: 关键美联储基金利率交易在回购波动中获得青睐
item.description: 在货币市场压力持续存在的情况下，交易员们越来越多地转向美国利率期货，他们在这里押注回购利率和联邦基金利率之间的变化。【原文：Traders are increasingly turning to US interest-rate futures where they are wagering on changes between repo rates and the federal funds rate as money-market stress persists.】

item.title: 在人工智能推动的涨势之后，AMD 的前景未能令投资者惊叹
item.description: 在人工智能芯片市场上与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）并驾齐驱的先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc., the main contender to Nvidia Corp. in the artificial intelligence chip market, failed to impress investors with its revenue forecast after an eye-popping rally sent expectations soaring.】

item.title: 超微股价因盈利预测令人失望而下跌
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc. ）股价在尾盘交易中暴跌，原因是这家服务器制造商的第一季度销售额和利润低于预期，而且对本期的盈利预测也令人失望，这加剧了人们对其利用人工智能设备需求的能力的担忧。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. shares tumbled in late trading after the server maker missed reduced estimates for first-quarter sales and profit and gave a disappointing earnings forecast for the current period, reinforcing concerns about its ability to capitalize on demand for AI equipment.】

item.title: Coupang 公布的利润令人失望，尽管收入超过预期
item.description: 专注于韩国的在线零售商 Coupang Inc. 公布的第三季度利润远低于华尔街的预期，尽管该公司击败了阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司等竞争对手，实现了营收增长。【原文：The South Korean-focused online retailer Coupang Inc. reported third-quarter profits that fell far short of Wall Street’s projections, despite beating back competition from rivals such as Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. to deliver a revenue beat.】

item.title: 美国银行下调博彩市场风险评级，DraftKings 和 Flutter 下跌
item.description: DraftKings Inc. 和 Flutter Entertainment Plc 周二股价下跌，此前美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：DraftKings Inc. and Flutter Entertainment Plc shares dropped on Tuesday after Bank of America Corp. downgraded the online sports betting operators, citing a variety of risks to the gambling market including the increasing prevalence of prediction markets.】

item.title: Match Outlook 因优先考虑 Tinder 产品测试而失手
item.description: Match Group Inc. 公布的第四季度营收展望低于预期，并警告称，其最大的约会应用 Tinder 的产品测试将以牺牲短期收益为代价。【原文：Match Group Inc. provided a weaker-than-expected fourth-quarter revenue outlook and warned that product testing at its largest dating app, Tinder, will come at the expense of short-term gains.】

item.title: Pinterest 预计假日季度销售疲软，股价下跌
item.description: Pinterest Inc. 预计本季度营收低于分析师预期，这表明尽管假日购物季即将到来，但该搜索平台的广告业务增长速度可能不及预期。该股在盘后交易中暴跌达 19%。【原文：Pinterest Inc. projected revenue for the current quarter that fell short of analysts’ estimates, a sign that the search platform’s advertising business may not be growing as quickly as expected despite the upcoming holiday shopping season. The stock plunged as much as 19% in after-hours trading.】

item.title: 加拿大将为国防企业注资以实施重组计划
item.description: (彭博社）--加拿大将更广泛地利用一家国有银行为国防工业公司提供贷款和风险资本，这是加拿大从增加军费开支中榨取经济利益的一系列措施的一部分。【原文：(Bloomberg) - Canada will make broader use of a state-owned bank to provide loans and venture capital to companies in the defense industry, part of a suite of measures to squeeze economic benefits from an increase in military spending.】

item.title: 加拿大加快企业投资和研究注销速度
item.description: 加拿大政府将继续执行去年宣布的措施，允许一些企业加快注销机器设备的速度，并立即将研发成本计入费用，以节省企业税。【原文：Canada’s government will proceed with measures announced last year to allow some businesses to speed up how quickly they write off machinery and equipment, as well as to expense research and development costs immediately to save on corporate taxes.】

item.title: 卡尼政府在预算中瞄准银行业竞争
item.description: 加拿大政府正瞄准金融业的竞争，承诺解决收费问题，让消费者更容易更换银行，并减轻小型贷款机构的监管负担。【原文：Canada’s government is taking aim at competition in the financial sector, pledging to tackle fees, make it easier for consumers to switch banks and reduce regulatory burdens for smaller lenders.】

item.title: 加密货币的零售时代受到冲击，ETF 面临 89600 美元的痛点
item.description: 随着加密货币进入主流市场，那些追捧比特币 ETF 的 "自己动手 "交易者们也尝到了数字资产炒作周期的甜头。【原文：The do-it-yourself traders who embraced Bitcoin ETFs as crypto moved into the mainstream are getting a taste of the digital-asset hype cycle.】

item.title: 美国首次公开募股（IPO）的选择范围缩小，因为停摆导致交易无法在感恩节前完成
item.description: 由于美国证券交易委员会的申报审查职能受到限制，政府的长期停摆正在慢慢粉碎那些仍想在年底前上市而不想采取变通办法的公司的希望。【原文：The protracted government shutdown is slowly crushing the hopes of companies that still want to go public before the end of the year without resorting to a workaround while the US Securities and Exchange Commission’s filing review functions are curtailed.】

item.title: 前卡普拉合规负责人称基金为艺术品和私人飞机支出费用
item.description: Capula 投资管理公司的前首席美国合规官指控该对冲基金公司错误地解雇了他，因为他对艺术品和私人飞机旅行以及某些交易活动的开支提出了担忧。【原文：Capula Investment Management’s former chief US compliance officer accused the hedge fund firm of wrongfully firing him for raising concerns about the expensing of artwork and private jet travel as well as certain trading activity.】

item.title: 尽管美国数据中心蓬勃发展，贝恩资本仍避免支持美国数据中心
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）正在回避对美国数据中心建设的投资，因为其私募股权竞争对手正急于支持为人工智能繁荣提供动力的实体基础设施。【原文：Bain Capital is eschewing investments in the US data center build-out, as its private equity rivals rush to back the physical infrastructure powering the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: OpenAI 为安卓设备带来索拉视频生成应用程序
item.description: OpenAI 在安卓设备上发布了其 Sora 社交视频应用程序，一个月前，这家人工智能公司在 iPhone 上推出了这项备受欢迎和争议的服务。【原文：OpenAI is releasing its Sora social video app on Android devices, one month after the artificial intelligence company launched the popular — and controversial — service on iPhone.】

item.title: 据报道，阿波罗撤回竞购，约翰爸爸下挫幅度创 2020 年以来最大
item.description: 据报道，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Papa John’s International Inc. plunged following a report that Apollo Global Management Inc. pulled its bid to take the pizza chain private.】

item.title: 法院批准 Azul 6.5 亿美元的债权人支持供股计划
item.description: 巴西 Azul SA 航空公司的融资计划已获得法院批准，该计划得到了债券持有人的支持，重组后债券持有人将成为该航空公司的主要股东。【原文：Brazil’s Azul SA has secured court approval for a financing plan backed by bondholders, who are set to become the airline’s major shareholders after the restructuring.】

item.title: 联合利华冰淇淋分拆交易首次亮相面临停产延期
item.description: 联合利华公司（Unilever Plc）剥离的冰淇淋部门将比原计划晚近一个月开始交易，此前美国政府停摆导致上市被推迟。【原文：Unilever Plc’s spinoff of its ice cream unit will start trading nearly a month later than planned, after the listing was delayed by the US government shutdown.】

item.title: 量化基金利用 ESG 信号挑选澳大利亚股票赢家
item.description: 一家专注于澳大利亚股票的量化基金正在击败市场，因为该基金认为，具有更高环境、社会和公司治理资质的公司也更高效、更有利可图。【原文：A quantitative fund focused on Australian equities is beating the market by betting that companies with higher ESG credentials are also more efficient and profitable.】

item.title: 西格玛曾是锂行业的宠儿，如今股价下跌 29%，困境加剧
item.description: Sigma Lithium Corp. 的股价暴跌，原因是人们对近期产量的疑虑越来越大，而且一个关键的扩产项目可能会延期。【原文：Sigma Lithium Corp. is plunging amid growing doubts about near-term production and potential delays to a key expansion project.】

item.title: IBM 将裁员数千人，专注软件业务增长
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines Corp. ）本季度将裁员数千人，同时继续将业务重心转向高增长的软件和服务。【原文：International Business Machines Corp. will cut thousands of workers this quarter while it continues to shift the focus of its business to higher-growth software and services.】

item.title: 美国股指跌破历史纪录，国债上涨
item.description: 由于对股票估值的担忧加剧了股市的疲软，并使投资者转向政府债券，周二国债价格走高。【原文：Treasury prices edged higher on Tuesday as worries over equity valuations fueled weakness in stocks and sent investors into government bonds.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）延长与塞内加尔的融资谈判，推动新计划的实施
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）延长了与塞内加尔的会谈，双方正努力敲定新贷款计划的框架。【原文：The International Monetary Fund extended talks with Senegal as the two sides work to finalize the framework for a new lending program.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司浅水油田销售受阻
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）寻求剥离一些海上油田的控制权，此举将使巴西石油巨头免于承担拆除旧平台的高昂费用。【原文：Petrobras sought to divest control of some offshore oil fields in a move that would have shielded the Brazilian oil giant from hefty costs to dismantle old platforms.】

item.title: 亚马逊要求 "惑 "阻止人工智能代理购物
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）向 Perplexity AI 公司发出了一封终止信，要求这家人工智能搜索初创公司停止允许其人工智能浏览器代理 Comet 为用户进行在线购物。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has sent a cease-and-desist letter to Perplexity AI Inc. demanding that the artificial intelligence search startup stop allowing its AI browser agent, Comet, to make purchases online for users.】
